data.title: How Green Was My Valley. The Screenplay For The John Ford Directed Film. by Dunne, Philip: Cloth with Dustjacket (1990) Special Edition.
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780944166055 - Special Edition. - Cloth with Dustjacket - Santa Teresa Press., CA. - 1990 - THIS IS A SPECIAL LIMITED EDITION OF ONLY 250 COPIES WHICH HAVE BEEN SIGNED BY PHILIP DUNNE AND RODDY McDOWALL. A lovely edition of the screenplay for the John Ford directed adaptation of the Richard Llewellyn novel about a Welsh mining community. The film was a popular and critical sucess and was nominated for 10 Oscars wining 5 including best picture over "Citizen Kane", but the screenplay lost out to "Here Comes Mr. Jordan." Go figure. Includes a long intro. by Dunne and 15 nicely reproduced stills. Fine/fine. - How Green Was My Valley. The Screenplay For The John Ford Directed Film.
